name: tool-vault-packager
description: ToolVault packaging system for creating deployable .pyz files

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf tmp_package_contents && rm -rf shared-types
scripts.copy-shared-types: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail && mkdir -p shared-types && echo "Copying shared-types..." && if [ -d "../shared-types" ]; then echo "Using ../shared-types" && cp -r ../shared-types/* shared-types/; elif [ -d "../../libs/shared-types" ]; then echo "Using ../../libs/shared-types" && cp -r ../../libs/shared-types/* shared-types/; else echo "ERROR: shared-types not found in ../shared-types or ../../libs/shared-types" && exit 1; fi && echo "Copied shared-types successfully" && ls -la shared-types/'
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && python packager.py tools --output dist/toolvault.pyz
scripts.build:spa: npm run copy-shared-types && cd spa && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:spa
scripts.test: test -f dist/toolvault.pyz && echo 'Test passed: dist/toolvault.pyz exists' || (echo 'Test failed: dist/toolvault.pyz not found' && exit 1)

author: ToolVault
